A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars The Last Jedi is a hell of a movie with enjoyable twists and turns that will genuinely surprise you. I loved this movie and it definitely gave more character development to many of the characters from the previous movie The Force Awakens. There are maybe two or three scenes I had problems with that made me a little worried during the first act of the movie\, but those scenes were subsided by the awesome plot that was brought with the second and third acts of the movie.
